abstract: The National Labor Relations Board said a company fired an employee illegally after she criticized her supervisor.
snippet: The National Labor Relations Board said a company fired an employee illegally after she criticized her supervisor.
lead_paragraph: In what labor officials and lawyers view as a ground-breaking case involving workers and social media, the National Labor Relations Board has accused a company of illegally firing an employee after she criticized her supervisor on her Facebook page.

headline.main: Company Accused of Firing Over Facebook Post
headline.print_headline: Labor Board Says Rights Apply on Net
